docs.lead_paragraph: ALBANY -- Gov. David A. Paterson appears to have learned something about the politics of tax returns.

headline.main: Paterson Releases Details of His Taxes

docs.abstract: Gov. David A. Paterson and his wife, Michelle, made more than $10,000 worth of cash contributions to charities in 2008, after being criticized for paltry giving in earlier years.

docs.lead_paragraph: The company sold its pharmacy benefits business to Express Scripts for nearly $4.7 billion but other big health insurers may not follow suit.

headline.main: WellPoint Sells Its Pharmacy Benefits Division
headline.print_headline: WellPoint Sells Its Pharmacy Benefits Division to Express Scripts for $4.7 Billion

docs.snippet: The company sold its pharmacy benefits business to Express Scripts for nearly $4.7 billion but other big health insurers may not follow suit.

docs.lead_paragraph: Express Scripts said Monday that it was acquiring the pharmacy benefit management business of WellPoint in a deal that will include cash and up to $1.4 billion in stock.

headline.seo: Express Scripts Buys WellPoint Pharmacy Unit for $4.7 Billion
headline.main: Drug Benefit Unit in $4.7 Billion Deal
headline.print_headline: Express Scripts Buys WellPoint Unit for $4.7 Billion

docs.snippet: Express Scripts said Monday that it was acquiring the pharmacy benefit management business of WellPoint in a deal that will include cash and up to $1.4 billion in stock.

docs.lead_paragraph: Express Scripts said it is acquiring the pharmacy benefit management business of WellPoint in a deal valuing the unit at nearly $4.7 billion in cash and stock.

headline.main: Express Scripts to Buy WellPoint's Pharmacy Unit

docs.abstract: Express Scripts said it is acquiring the pharmacy benefit management business of WellPoint in a deal valuing the unit at nearly $4.7 billion in cash and stock. The negotiations on the deal, which was formally announced in a press release early Monday morning, were previously reported by Andrew Ross Sorkin and Michael J. de la [...]
docs.snippet: Express Scripts said it is acquiring the pharmacy benefit management business of WellPoint in a deal valuing the unit at nearly $4.7 billion in cash and stock. The negotiations on the deal, which was formally announced in a press release early Monday...

docs.lead_paragraph: The deal could still collapse, people briefed on the talks said, but if it goes through it would be valued at nearly $5 billion.

docs.lead_paragraph: Richard A. Gephardt says universal coverage cannot pass this year -- and he is urging the White House to defer that goal until it enacts cost-saving reforms in health care delivery.

headline.main: Health Care Cautions, From One Who Knows
headline.print_headline: Health Care Cautions, From One Who Knows
